#!/bin/bash #lesslinux provides x11vnc
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
x11vnc='' conn='' pass='' parg='' sarg=''
case $1 in start) for i in `cat /proc/cmdline` ; do case "$i" in x11vnc=*) x11vnc=` echo "$i" | awk -F '=' '{print $2}' ` mode=` echo $x11vnc | awk -F '|' '{print $2}' ` if [ "$mode" = reverse ] ; then conn=` echo $x11vnc | awk -F '|' '{print $3}' ` else pass=` echo $x11vnc | awk -F '|' '{print $3}' ` fi ;; vncssl=*) vncssl=` echo "$i" | awk -F '=' '{print $2}' ` if [ "$vncssl" -gt 0 -o "$vncssl" = true ] ; then sarg='-ssl SAVE_NOPROMPT' fi ;; esac done parg='' # carg='-ncache 10' carg='' if [ -n "$pass" ] ; then parg="-passwd $pass" fi if [ "$mode" = "remote" ] ; then x11vnc -forever -display :0 $sarg $parg $carg & elif [ "$mode" = "local" ] ; then x11vnc -forever -display :0 -listen 127.0.0.1 $sarg $parg $carg & elif [ "$mode" = "reverse" ] && [ -n "$conn" ] ; then x11vnc -coe -loop -display :0 $carg -connect "$conn" & fi ;; esac
